member.summary: Creates a new Sound Resource based on the specified AudioData, saves it and returns a reference to it.

member.name: M:Duality.Editor.Plugins.Base.EditorActions.AudioDataToSound.CreateMultipleFromAudioData(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Duality.ContentRef{Duality.Resources.AudioData}})
member.summary: Creates a set of new Sound Resources based on the specified AudioData, saves it and returns references to it. The incoming AudioData is automatically grouped to the least number of Sounds, according to naming and path conventions.

member.summary: Given the specified key-Type mapping of required editors, this method will dispose all currently active editors that are no longer needed.

member.name: M:Duality.Editor.Plugins.Base.PropertyEditors.ResourceAssetPropertyEditor.CreateMissingEditors(System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyDictionary{System.String,System.Type})
member.summary: Given the specified key-Type mapping of required editors, this method will create new editors for all keys that do not have one. This method assumes that was called before and thus doesn't check whether any of the existing editors are still valid.

member.summary: Returns a new lambda method that acts setter for custom AssetInfo data values from the currently selected objects and with the given key.
